work.company: Colorado State University Pandemic Preparedness Team
work.summary: Assist Data Modeling Team, Regulatory and HIPAA compliance, Data Warehousing, Data visualization, Data cleaning, Database ETL
highlights: Provide deliverables for a wide variety of technical understandings, ranging from general public to COVID researchers to Data Science professionals
Ensure HIPAA compliance for all outgoing research datasets, with upwards of 40,000 individuals
Model COVID cases for a variety of scenarios for decision making teams

work.summary: Oversee and coordinate activities between four departments, assisting in over $12 million dollars in sales. Handled training, personal management, and oversaw day to day activties as well as special busy season tasks
highlights: Re-organization of delivery system from numerical to alphabetical after system failure
Provide one on one yearly performance reviews
Key holder and end point contact on $100,000 sale days

work.summary: Manufactured custom medical devices and preformed health office administration
highlights: Served as the main patient point of contact
Routinely managed the entirety of the business, on short notice

volunteer.summary: Responsible for outreach to potential new members
Responsible for maintaining section history and advising five chapter historians
highlights: Distinguished Service Key - Highest Chapter level distinction
Section Notable Alumni - One of three in the past five years

Alpha Sigma Kappa - Women in Technical StudiesÂ® is a unique social sorority for women pursuing technical majors. As a sorority, we offer women the opportunity to develop leadership skills, friendships, a sense of belonging, and a network of support.

awards.title: Distinguished Service Key
awards.summary: The Chapter Distinguished Service Key is a chapter's highest level of distinction. The awards is given in recognition to brothers for outstanding service to their chapter; that is making an outstanding and unique contribution to the chapter as a whole, exemplifying and furthering the principals of Leadership, Friendship, and Service.
